original_text: Look! The Lord is coming with fire. His chariots will blow in like a strong storm. People will see his great anger, as he comes to punish his enemies with flames of fire. Look! The Lord is coming with fire. His chariots will blow in like a strong storm. People will see his great anger, as he comes to punish his enemies with flames of fire. Look! The Lord is coming with fire. His chariots will blow in like a strong storm. People will see his great anger, as he comes to punish his enemies with flames of fire.
korean_text: 보라 여호와께서 불에 둘러싸여 강림하시리니 그의 수레들은 회오리바람 같으리로다 그가 혁혁한 위세로 노여움을 나타내시며 맹렬한 화염으로 책망하실 것이라

sentences.original_text: The Lord is coming with fire.
His chariots will blow in like a strong storm.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 전차들은 거센 폭풍처럼 몰아칠 것이다.

sentences.original_text: People will see his great anger,
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그의 크신 진노를 볼 것이다.

sentences.original_text: as he comes to punish his enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 원수들을 벌하기 위해 오실 때
